Original: Ah... This one is from a travelling
sorcerer. It seems he wants you to
find him a [Color:5][Item:1443][Color:0].
[Page]
That volume seems to be out of print,
but apparently there are a few copies
floating around this town.
[Page]
If that's so, you might check with
Wynne at the Berund Atelier. They seem
to stock all sorts of things.
[Page]
Kismet be with you, and I shall await
your swift return.
Translation: Ah... This one is from a travelling
sorcerer. It seems he wants you to
find him a [Color:5][Item:1443][Color:0].
[Page]
That volume seems to be out of print,
but apparently there are a few copies
floating around this town.
[Page]
If that's so, you might check with
Wynne at the Berund Atelier. They seem
to stock all sorts of things.
[Page]
Kismet be with you, and I shall await
your swift return.

Original: Welcome back. Were you able to get
the [Item:1443]? Oh... you bought
one from Berund Atelier?
[Page]
So you purchased your way toward the
conclusion of this request. Hmm...
you did give me a [Item:1443].
[Page]
And as promised, your reward. But was
it worth the money you spent on the
volume?
Translation: Welcome back. Were you able to get
the [Item:1443]? Oh... you bought
one from Berund Atelier?
[Page]
So you purchased your way toward the
conclusion of this request. Hmm...
you did give me a [Item:1443].
[Page]
And as promised, your reward. But was
it worth the money you spent on the
volume?

Original: Welcome back. Were you able to get
the [Item:1443]? Oh... you won
it from a monster?
[Page]
It sounds like you went through much
for this one volume. But such is the
nature of requests.
[Page]
It is not simple errand-running, like
sending a boy to the store. Money
cannot buy the experience you had.
[Page]
But I think you know well the feeling
I refer to. I will have more work for
you in the future, I believe.
Translation: Welcome back. Were you able to get
the [Item:1443]? Oh... you won
it from a monster?
[Page]
It sounds like you went through much
for this one volume. But such is the
nature of requests.
[Page]
It is not simple errand-running, like
sending a boy to the store. Money
cannot buy the experience you had.
[Page]
But I think you know well the feeling
I refer to. I will have more work for
you in the future, I believe.

Original: Oh, dat [Color:5][Item:1443][Color:0]? Ya took a
request at da bar for it? Yeah, we
gots one. Just came in da other day.
[Page]
But being as it's outta print an all,
it'll set ya back. Dat'll be 1,000en.
Ya still want it?
[Page]
Hey, ya know, dis soldier was bragging
about how he got one of dem books offa
red bear in B3F of da Woodlands.
[Page]
Maybe ya should ask him more about
it? 'Course, if ya don't wanna go ta
da trouble, ya can still buy ours.
Translation: Oh, dat [Color:5][Item:1443][Color:0]? Ya took a
request at da bar for it? Yeah, we
gots one. Just came in da other day.
[Page]
But being as it's outta print an all,
it'll set ya back. Dat'll be 1,000en.
Ya still want it?
[Page]
Hey, ya know, dis soldier was bragging
about how he got one of dem books offa
red bear in B3F of da Woodlands.
[Page]
Maybe ya should ask him more about
it? 'Course, if ya don't wanna go ta
da trouble, ya can still buy ours.

Original: What's it gonna be? Ya still want dat
[Item:1443] for 1,000en?
Translation: What's it gonna be? Ya still want dat
[Item:1443] for 1,000en?

Original: [Color:5]Buy the [Item:1443]?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Buy the [Item:1443]?[Color:0]

Original: Sorry. I'da sold it ta yas cheaper,
but den I wouldn'ta made any profit.
[Page]
Here ya go! One [Item:1443].
Tanks for shopping!
Translation: Sorry. I'da sold it ta yas cheaper,
but den I wouldn'ta made any profit.
[Page]
Here ya go! One [Item:1443].
Tanks for shopping!

Original: Doesn't seem like ya got enough money
ta cover it. Maybe ya should just go
search for one.
Translation: Doesn't seem like ya got enough money
ta cover it. Maybe ya should just go
search for one.

Original: Finding your own stuff is more like
how explorers do it anyway. Dat's how
ya're supposed to solve a quest!
[Page]
Da soldier's out on a mission about da
red bear den in B3F of da Woodlands.
Good luck, [Guild] crew!
Translation: Finding your own stuff is more like
how explorers do it anyway. Dat's how
ya're supposed to solve a quest!
[Page]
Da soldier's out on a mission about da
red bear den in B3F of da Woodlands.
Good luck, [Guild] crew!

Original: Huh? Dat book? We just sold out...
ya really wanted one?
[Page]
Oh, wait, ya got it already! Heh, I
knew it. Way ta keep on top of things!
Translation: Huh? Dat book? We just sold out...
ya really wanted one?
[Page]
Oh, wait, ya got it already! Heh, I
knew it. Way ta keep on top of things!

Original: In search of the [Color:5][Item:1443][Color:0],
you see a soldier out of breath and
wary of his surroundings.
[Page]
Could this be the soldier you heard
of at the Berund Atelier who found
the [Item:1443]?
Translation: In search of the [Color:5][Item:1443][Color:0],
you see a soldier out of breath and
wary of his surroundings.
[Page]
Could this be the soldier you heard
of at the Berund Atelier who found
the [Item:1443]?

Original: "I got attacked by a monster... It was
a close call. I only escaped because
I threw away my pack to distract it."
[Page]
You ask about the [Item:1443],
though you suspect you know where
this story is headed...
[Page]
"Oh, the book? It might've been in
the pack. I wanted it, but I'd rather
have my life than that.
[Page]
"If you want the book, you'll have
to get it back from the monster.
[Page]
"Go south and you'll find [Color:5]water that
flows from some rocks[Color:0]. Lots of people
use it. The monster should be there.
[Page]
"Whatever you pick up in the labyrinth
belongs to you. I don't want to risk
it, so if you find it, it's yours."
[Page]
Having said that, the soldier clasps
you on the shoulder before walking
off, most likely back to town.
Translation: "I got attacked by a monster... It was
a close call. I only escaped because
I threw away my pack to distract it."
[Page]
You ask about the [Item:1443],
though you suspect you know where
this story is headed...
[Page]
"Oh, the book? It might've been in
the pack. I wanted it, but I'd rather
have my life than that.
[Page]
"If you want the book, you'll have
to get it back from the monster.
[Page]
"Go south and you'll find [Color:5]water that
flows from some rocks[Color:0]. Lots of people
use it. The monster should be there.
[Page]
"Whatever you pick up in the labyrinth
belongs to you. I don't want to risk
it, so if you find it, it's yours."
[Page]
Having said that, the soldier clasps
you on the shoulder before walking
off, most likely back to town.

Original: If you trust the soldier, you can try
to win back the book, though buying it
is now sounding more appealing...
Translation: If you trust the soldier, you can try
to win back the book, though buying it
is now sounding more appealing...

Original: You see a monster at rest at the end
of the path. The sight immediately
sets the party on edge...
[Page]
As you squint, you can see a torn
pack hanging from the monster's
deadly claws.
[Page]
If you wish to take back the book,
you have no alternative but to
challenge the monster.
Translation: You see a monster at rest at the end
of the path. The sight immediately
sets the party on edge...
[Page]
As you squint, you can see a torn
pack hanging from the monster's
deadly claws.
[Page]
If you wish to take back the book,
you have no alternative but to
challenge the monster.

Original: After defeating the monster, you at
last claim the pack stuck on its
claws.
[Page]
You rummage around inside and find a
luxuriously bound [Color:5][Item:1443][Color:0]!
Exactly what the client wanted!
Translation: After defeating the monster, you at
last claim the pack stuck on its
claws.
[Page]
You rummage around inside and find a
luxuriously bound [Color:5][Item:1443][Color:0]!
Exactly what the client wanted!

Original: But that is not all the pack contains.
You also find a number of medicines
and a large knife for exploration!
[Page]
What a stroke of luck! You are able
to claim them as your own without any
further effort on your part!
Translation: But that is not all the pack contains.
You also find a number of medicines
and a large knife for exploration!
[Page]
What a stroke of luck! You are able
to claim them as your own without any
further effort on your part!

Original: The request is now complete! You
quickly leave the area, eager to
report back.
Translation: The request is now complete! You
quickly leave the area, eager to
report back.
